snippet: Lucent Technologies said today that it would spend $40 million to increase manufacturing of components for optical networks in Southern California, creating 450 jobs in the next 18 months.    The company, the No. 1 phone equipment maker, also said...
lead_paragraph: Lucent Technologies said today that it would spend $40 million to increase manufacturing of components for optical networks in Southern California, creating 450 jobs in the next 18 months. The company, the No. 1 phone equipment maker, also said it would add 2,000 people in Europe in the next six months after its business there grew by almost 50 percent last year, helped by sales to providers of phone and wireless services.
abstract: Lucent Technologies will spend $40 million to increase manufacturing of components for optical networks in Southern California, creating 450 jobs in next 18 months; Lucent says it has won $51 million order from Egyptian Company for Networks for equipment to expand company's data network (S)
